com.truemesh.squiggle.criteria
Class NoCriteria

java.lang.Object
  com.truemesh.squiggle.Criteria
      com.truemesh.squiggle.criteria.NoCriteria
All Implemented Interfaces:
Outputable
public class NoCriteria
extends Criteria

Class NoCriteria is a Criteria that represents an absent operand in an SQL predicate expression so that one may represent a unary operator (for example, NOT) using a binary operator derived from a BaseLogicGroup).

Author:
Derek Mahar
